meanings.sent1: After missing the target, he decided to reshoot the arrow.
meanings.sent2: The director was reshooting a scene to get it just right.
meanings.sent3: The photographer kept reshooting the same picture, hoping for a better shot.
meanings.sent4: She felt like reshooting her life, starting fresh from the beginning.
meanings.sent5: The student reshooting the basketball was determined to make the winning shot.

meanings.sent1: The reshooting of the film took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: There was a reshooting of the scene due to technical issues.
meanings.sent3: The reshooting of the fireworks display made the audience cheer even louder.
meanings.sent4: The reshooting of the commercial added extra costs to the production.
meanings.sent5: The reshooting of the photo shoot resulted in stunning new images.
